definition: Qianshan county in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1 qing4], Anhui
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Qianshan county in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1 qing4], Anhui

sentences.english: Gaobei subtle hydrocarbon reservoir is situated in northern flank of Gaoshangpu buried hill of Nanpu depression.
sentences.chinese: 高北隱蔽油氣藏位於南堡凹陷高尚堡潛山北翼。

sentences.english: Paleozoic buried hills of NW, NE trending developes well in Zhoukou depression.
sentences.chinese: 周口坳陷主要發育北西和北東向的古生界潛山。

sentences.english: Banqiao buried hill is located in the deep zone of Bannan fault block in Banqiao oil field.
sentences.chinese: 板橋古潛山位於板橋油氣田板南斷塊深層。

sentences.english: The classification and characteristics of buried hills are summarized according to different classification criteria.
sentences.chinese: 依據不同的分類標準，總結了潛山的各種分類與特點。

sentences.english: PurposeTo provide basis for further exploration of deep hurled hill reservoir of Shuguang area.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲曙先低潛山帶的進一步勘探提供依據。

sentences.english: The formation of Paleozoic buried hills in Jiyang depression was chiefly controlled by tectonic movement.
sentences.chinese: 濟陽坳陷古生界潛山的形成主要受構造運動的控制。

sentences.english: The industry oil has been found in Wanggu 1 buried hill for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 王古1潛山是首次在東營凹陷鑽探成功的深部潛山。

sentences.english: The industry oil has been found in Wanggu 1 buried hill for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 王古1潛山是首次在東營凹陷鑽探成功的深部潛山。

sentences.english: The negative inversion structure is of importance for the formation of buried hill reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 負反轉構造對潛山油氣藏的形成具有重要意義。

sentences.english: Wumaying buried hill is a deeply buried one situated in south of Huanghua depression.
sentences.chinese: 烏馬營潛山是黃驊坳陷南區凹陷內深埋的潛山。

sentences.english: Wumaying buried hill is a deeply buried one situated in south of Huanghua depression.
sentences.chinese: 烏馬營潛山是黃驊坳陷南區凹陷內深埋的潛山。

sentences.english: Mesozoic Era block fault buried hill preliminary formation period;
sentences.chinese: 新生代早期拉張作用和斷塊潛山形成期。
